# Third-party dependencies

| Name                                                     | Use                                      |
|----------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------|
| [cgltf](https://github.com/jkuhlmann/cgltf)              | Parsing scenes and models.               |
| [cpuinfo](https://github.com/pytorch/cpuinfo)            | Fetching the name of the CPU at runtime. |
| [dcimgui](https://github.com/dearimgui/dear_bindings)    | Auto-generated C bindings for imgui.     |
| [imgui](https://github.com/ocornut/imgui)                | Debugging UI.                            |
| [joltc](https://github.com/amerkoleci/joltc)             | 3D physics engine.                       |
| [maple-font](https://github.com/subframe7536/maple-font) | Default UI font.                         |
| [qoi](https://github.com/phoboslab/qoi)                  | Image parsing.                           |
| [sdl3](https://github.com/libsdl-org/SDL)                | Rendering and input.                     |
| [stb](https://github.com/nothings/stb)                   | Font parsing.                            |
| [tomlc17](https://github.com/cktan/tomlc17)              | Project file parsing.                    |
